jd: From: Sankar, intellecttechsolutions pbsankar@intellecttechsolutions.com Reply to: pbsankar@intellecttechsolutions.com Role : .NET Architect - Need only locals - Columbus ,Ohio | C2CLocal to OH are preferred.Accepted Visa - H-1B, USC, GC, H4 EAD.Interview: Video InterviewLocation: 30 E Broad Street Columbus Ohio Position : Hybrid – days in office are on an ‘as needed’ basis, but no more than 2x weeklyRate: 65 C2C max SKILL MATRIX: SkillsNumber of years’ experienceEG: 5 YEARSLast UsedEG: 2024.NET Framework (4.7.2 and higher), .net core 2.2 and higher – Required – 5 years Visual Studio (2022/2019) - Required – 5 years SQL Server 2015 - Required – 5 years Asp.net MVC 5, MVC Core - Required – 5 years Entity Framework 6.2 including LINQ to SQL, Entity framework core - Required – 5 years Kendo UI Controls for ASP.NET MVC - Required – 5 years Java Script, jQuery and CSS 3.0 - Required – 5 years C# 7.0 and higher - Required – 5 years WCF/Web API - Required – 5 years Visual Studio Unit Testing - Required – 5 years Azure DevOps - Required – 5 years Build and release using DevOps pipeline - Required – 5 years Azure App Service - Required – 5 years Azure blob storage - Required – 5 years Primary work objectives:MHAS is looking for a skilled IT Consultant to refactor an existing custom .net/C# Human Resources software suite hosted on Azure to meet the needs of our Agency and constituents. In addition to the attached technical proficiencies the selected candidate will demonstrate the ability to work directly with our Human Resource professionals, understand the basic terminology and business functions of HR, and have the ability to communicate verbally and in writing to the project sponsors. Prior experience with HR applications or processes is not mandatory but preferred. Having worked on an interface with Ohio’s ERP (OAKS) is also advantageous.
